title: How to get a superhero body, according to Chris Hemsworth's personal trainer
text:
It’s not a Marvel film without a gratuitous shirtless scene from the lead superhero, and Thor is no exception.

When he’s not zipping around the universe fighting purple titans or keeping his evil siblings out of trouble, Thor seemingly can’t resist the opportunity to tear off his shirt and show off those spectacular muscles. And given the fact the Marvel Cinematic Universe is by far the biggest movie franchise in history, it’s no surprise that fans are keen to emulate his look.

“I get asked on a daily basis: ‘How do I get my arms to look like Chris's?’” says Luke Zocchi, the Australian personal trainer who has worked with Thor star Chris Hemsworth for the past seven years to help achieve a physique...
description: It’s not a Marvel film without a gratuitous shirtless scene from the lead superhero, and Thor is no exception.
